LanguageData.RC2_FloxacineAddiction.label: floxacine addiction
LanguageData.RC2_FloxacineAddiction.description: what are you doing with this? Floxacine isn't addictive.
LanguageData.RC2_FloxacineHigh.label: floxacine
LanguageData.RC2_FloxacineHigh.description: Floxacine boosts immunity almost completely. Taking floxacine too much can cause severe liver damage.
LanguageData.RC2_FloxacineTolerance.label: floxacine tolerance
LanguageData.RC2_FloxacineTolerance.description: The pawn has built up a tolerance to Floxacine. It can cause severe liver damage at high levels.
